definition: to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Just my two cents' worth based on forty years' wandering around observing with eyes and ears open.
sentences.chinese: 這只是在下基於四十多年所見所聞的一點愚見，呵呵。

sentences.english: But in my humble opinion, it might be attributed to the paper writing.
sentences.chinese: 然以鄙人愚見，或許可歸因於論文之過。

sentences.english: In my opinion, there are actually two root reasons.
sentences.chinese: 依我愚見，實際上存在兩個根本原因。

definition: to display one's slight skill before an expert (idiom)
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation
iron mask (as defensive armor)/fig. upright and selfless person
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
